reviewText: discussion proceeds in logical way- start by working one example then go back and get your questions answered. trail software download no problems. highly recommend but must buy hardcopy to get dvd.  dvd not included in e download.  Amazon very quick to help me cancel e download and order hardcopy once i became aware the content of the dvd not included in e download.  complements to author and thanks to Amazon for working problem.  With e download text easy read on pc screen not certain would be good read on K.
title: Handbook of Statistical Analysis and Data Mining Applications
